inputs.name: overOpsAppURL
inputs.label: OverOps Backend URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The OverOps Endpoint to be used with the link options (Saas: https://app.overops.com)

inputs.name: overOpsSID
inputs.label: Service ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The OverOps environment identifier (e.g S4567) to inspect data for this build

inputs.name: overOpsAPIKey
inputs.label: API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: API Key for interaction with OverOps API

inputs.name: applicationName
inputs.label: Application Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use this parameter if the application name will be static. Application Name as specified in OverOps

inputs.name: deploymentName
inputs.label: Deployment Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use this parameter if the deployment_name will be static. Deployment Name as specified in OverOps

inputs.name: newEvents
inputs.label: New Events
inputs.helpMarkDown: If any new errors is detected, the build will be marked as failed

inputs.name: regexFilter
inputs.label: Exception Filter (RegEx)
inputs.helpMarkDown: A way to filter out specific event types from affecting the outcome of the OverOps Reliability report.

inputs.name: markUnstable
inputs.label: Mark Unstable
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set to true the build will be failed if any of the above gates are met

inputs.name: printTopIssues
inputs.label: Print Top Issues
inputs.helpMarkDown: Prints the top X events (as provided by this parameter) with the highest volume of errors detected within the active time window, This is useful when used in conjunction with Max Error Volume to identify the errors which caused a build to fail

inputs.name: resurfacedErrors
inputs.label: Resurfaced Errors
inputs.helpMarkDown: Prints the top X events (as provided by this parameter) with the highest volume of errors detected within the active time window, This is useful when used in conjunction with Max Error Volume to identify the errors which caused a build to fail

inputs.name: maxErrorVolume
inputs.label: Max Error Volume
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set the max total error volume allowed. If exceeded the build will be marked as failed

inputs.name: maxUniqueErrors
inputs.label: Max Unique Errors
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set the max total error volume allowed. If exceeded the build will be marked as failed

inputs.name: criticalExceptionTypes
inputs.label: Critical Exception Types
inputs.helpMarkDown:
A comma delimited list of exception types that are deemed as severe regardless of their volume.
- If any events of any exceptions listed have a count greater than zero, the build will be marked as unstable. Blank to skip this test.
(For example: NullPointerException,IndexOutOfBoundsException)

inputs.name: showEventsForPassedGates
inputs.label: Show Events for Passed Gates
inputs.helpMarkDown: Display events for the quality gates even if the the gates passed.

inputs.name: link
inputs.label: Link Report
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set true if you want to simply generate a link to the report to view later
